name: 3eltr3d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c1))

comment: Substitution of equal classes into membership relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
